trans-unit.source: Represents an error condition when a rights management operation cannot complete successfully.
trans-unit.target: 当权限管理操作无法成功完成时，则表示存在错误。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.RightsManagementException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.RightsManagementException"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.RightsManagementException"></xref> class with a given <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.RightsManagementFailureCode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.RightsManagementException"></xref>类，该类具有给定<xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.RightsManagementFailureCode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The failure code for the error.
trans-unit.target: 错误失败代码。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.RightsManagementException"></xref> class with a given message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.RightsManagementException"></xref>与给定的消息的类。

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述错误的消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.RightsManagementException"></xref> class and sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> store with information about the exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.RightsManagementException"></xref>类并设置<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>使用有关异常的信息存储。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 承载序列化的数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 有关源或目标的上下文信息。
